name: Intro To Dungeons
description:
Welcome to Dungeons 101, or what I like to call Intro To Dungeons.

In this class you will learn the basics of traversing a dungeon. Exploring the maze like layout, collecting treasure, and going as fast as you can because you have limited amount of light available.

Collecting additional light sources, and Treasure, can be done using the LEFT GRIP BUTTON.

Movement can be done using UP, DOWN, LEFT and RIGHT on the LEFT TRACK PAD. You will move relative to the direction you are facing.

Turn by... turning around!

To reignite your source of light, hold your spares near to your already ignited torch and press the RIGHT GRIP BUTTON.

Your goal is to find as much treasure as you can and reach the golden glowing end location.

Every game is different, using a Maze Generation Algorithm.

There are currently NO horror elements (unless you're afraid of the dark). Should they be added, I will add the option to play without them as well.

[NOTICE] I only have a Vive so have not tested the Oculus controller input. But have added alternate ways of moving forward. Try using the left trigger!
